text: The Bride! is an upcoming American monster movie. It is expected to be released on September 26, 2025. It was directed by Maggie Gyllenhaal. She also wrote and co-produced the movie with Osnat Handelsman-Keren, Talia Kleinhendler, and Emma Tillinger Koskoff. It is inspired by the 1935 movie Bride of Frankenstein. The movie is set in 1930s Chicago and follows Frankenstein's monster who wants Dr. Euphronius to create a wife for him. Principal photography began on April 22, 2024 at the Snug Harbor Cultural Center in Staten Island, New York and finished in Sacramento, California on November 26. == Cast == ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2025 movies Category:2020s English-language movies Category:2020s science fiction horror movies Category:IMAX movies Category:American monster movies Category:Movies based on books Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:Upcoming movies Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: The Bride!
